>   File        : /src/mockDataSource.zip 
>   Uploaded by : jlinkyh <john.link@...> 
>   Description : A mock implementation of javax.sql.DataSource. This
> requires hsqldb and the mock objects library (jar files included). 
> 
> You can access this file at the URL
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/mockDataSource.zip 

Besides the test cases, I also included a *very* simple example. The mock
data source has been successfully used to develop a vanilla user database and
helped me discover a couple of useful JDBC utility objects.

I welcome any suggestions for improving and enhancing the mock data source.

Johannes
